alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 07 at 3:42AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT WESTERN HUMBOLDT COUNTY THROUGH 415 AM PST... At 340 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers 17 miles northwest of Petrolia, or 28 miles northwest of Honeydew, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Arcata, Honeydew, Fortuna, Rio Dell, McKinleyville, Carlotta, Westhaven-Moonstone, Scotia, Petrolia, Ferndale, Myrtletown, Cutten, Hydesville, Capetown, Humboldt Hill, Freshwater, Arcata Arpt, Fernbridge, and Samoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt
